
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52925968">
<font face="MonospacedNumber, LarkHackSafariFont, LarkEmojiFont, LarkChineseQuote, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot">键盘按win+r键打开运行框输入regedit回车</font><font face="MonospacedNumber, LarkHackSafariFont, LarkEmojiFont, LarkChineseQuote, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot">找到HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\ProfileList</font><font face="MonospacedNumber, LarkHackSafariFont, LarkEmojiFont, LarkChineseQuote, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot">下带.bak字样的文件删掉重启即可</font></td></tr></tbody></table>
